personalInfo.name: Thomas
personalInfo.myDescription: I'm a passionate web-developer and content creator. My affinity is for back-end development and database design, however have spent most of my time working on front-end projects. Websites with beautiful UI/UX, and efficient back-ends, are the future that has already arrived.

degrees.name: CFA Level 2 Candidate
itemList: Passed CFA level 2 exam in December 2017, Sydney.

responsabilities: Stack used - Wordpress, PHP, HTML, CSS.
Led 3 person designer and development team.
Installed Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and Google Tag Manager.
Created content strategy and post timeline.
Wrote white-paper and designed application architecture.
Planned and managed IPO marketing strategy.
Grew Australian platform user-base from 30,000 to over 100,000.
Grew monthly Australian sessions to over 1 million.
Prepared quarterly and annual ROI reports.
Prepared custom designed financial performance reports.
Worked closely with project managers from architectural, engineering and economic divisions.
Managed budgeting and invoicing for large multi-million dollar infrastructure projects.
Prepared and managed invoicing for patrols department.
Assisted finance manager with budgeting and reporting.
Forecasted budgetory concerns for patrols department.

interests.title: About Me
interests.firstBlock: Apart from web development and technology, my interests include reading (philosophy, psychology and history), travelling, and playing soccer (footbal).
interests.secondBlock: During my downtime, I can be found watching history and war documentaries or listening to podcasts. I also enjoy meditating, and have sat three 10-day meditation retreats since 2014. I consider this to be a cornerstone of my self-development and think the world would be a better place if everyone sat at least one 10-day retreat in their lifetimes.
